Integrated lighting: The helmet can have built-in LED lights to improve visibility during low-light conditions or night rides.

Smart features: The helmet can be equipped with sensors and Bluetooth connectivity to monitor the rider's speed, heart rate, and other vital signs, and provide real-time feedback through a smartphone app.
Customization options: The helmet can have adjustable straps and a removable visor to accommodate different head sizes and riding styles.
Reflective materials: The helmet can be made with reflective materials to increase its visibility to motorists, especially in low-light conditions.
Integrated GPS and navigation: The helmet can have a GPS system and navigation features to help riders find their way and avoid getting lost.
